metadata.scraper_type: 最終版手動操作風格爬蟲
metadata.operation_flow: 輸入單字 → 選擇用例 → 擷取三要素 → 儲存管理

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊食火鍋搵料愛濫醋、蒜茸、番薑仔、蔥仔、豆乳、香油，伊講愛較厚味才會好食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I tsia̍h hué-ko ùn-liāu ài lām tshòo, suàn-jiông, huan-kiunn-á, tshang-á, tāu-jú, hiang-iû, i kóng ài khah kāu-bī tsiah ē hó-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他吃火鍋沾醬要摻雜醋、蒜泥、辣椒、蔥、豆腐乳、香油，他說要五味俱全才會好吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 酒廠買葡萄去激酒。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsiú-tshiúnn bé phû-tô khì kik-tsiú.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 酒廠買葡萄去釀酒。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 我約伊今仔日中晝佇公園會合，做伙去看櫻花。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guá iok i kin-á-ji̍t tiong-tàu tī kong-hn̂g huē-ha̍p, tsò-hué khì khuànn ing-hue.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我約他今天中午在公園會合，要一起去賞櫻。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 臺灣熱人出產真濟芳甜的果子，譬論檨仔、荔枝佮芳瓜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tâi-uân jua̍h--lâng tshut-sán tsin tsē phang-tinn ê kué-tsí, phì-lūn suāinn-á, nāi-tsi kah phang-kue.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 臺灣在夏天出產很多香甜的水果，例如芒果、荔枝和香瓜。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 最近足歹運，欲食菜頭湯，去買著蓬心的菜頭；欲去剃頭，剃頭店無開門，有影是「人若衰，種匏仔生菜瓜」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsuè-kīn tsiok pháinn-ūn, beh tsia̍h tshài-thâu-thng, khì bé-tio̍h pōng-sim ê tshài-thâu; beh khì thì-thâu, thì-thâu-tiàm bô khui-mn̂g, ū-iánn sī “lâng nā sue, tsìng pû-á senn tshài-kue”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 最近運氣很糟，想喝蘿蔔湯，竟買到空心的蘿蔔；想去理髮，理髮店沒開門，真的是「人一倒楣，種匏瓜也會長出絲瓜」。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿媽共燃好的青草仔茶，用漏仔貯入去玻璃矸仔，冰佇冰箱予逐家啉。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-má kā hiânn-hó ê tshenn-tsháu-á-tê, iōng lāu-á té ji̍p-khì po-lê kan-á, ping tī ping-siunn hōo ta̍k-ke lim.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 奶奶把煮好的青草茶，用漏斗裝進玻璃瓶中，冰在冰箱給大家喝。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 較早作田人攏放伴割稻仔，人若來鬥相共，愛攢三頓佮點心予人食，閣袂使驚人大食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Khah-tsá tsoh-tshân-lâng lóng pàng-phuānn kuah-tiū-á, lâng nā lâi tàu-sann-kāng, ài tshuân sann tǹg kah tiám-sim hōo lâng tsia̍h, koh bē-sái kiann lâng tuā-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 從前農人都輪流協助割稻子，人家如果來幫忙，要準備三餐跟點心給人家吃，還不能怕人家食量大。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這款蘭花真貴氣，無好種。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsit khuán lân-hue tsin kuì-khì, bô hó tsìng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這種蘭花帶貴氣，很不容易培育。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 食蒜仔吐蕗蕎。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsia̍h suàn-á thòo lōo-giō.。蒜頭比蕗蕎便宜，故用來比喻得不償失。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 吃蒜頭吐蕗蕎。蒜頭比蕗蕎便宜，故用來比喻得不償失。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這角勢有真濟人種番麥。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsit kak-sì ū tsin tsē lâng tsìng huan-be̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這一帶有很多人種玉蜀黍。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 用九層塔煎卵真好食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Iōng káu-tsàn-thah tsian nn̄g tsin hó-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 用九層塔煎蛋很好吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 進口的蘋果通常攏有蓋蠟。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsìn-kháu ê phông-kó thong-siông lóng ū kài-la̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 進口的蘋果通常都有上蠟。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 菝仔有到分無，共伊㨂甲一下就知。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Pua̍t-á ū kàu-hun--bô, kā i tàng-kah--tsi̍t-ē tō tsai.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 番石榴熟了沒，用指甲刺探看看就知道。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 表姊目頭懸，揣對象揀東揀西、揀碗揀箸，啥人知影經過幾若年煞「揀啊揀，揀著一个賣龍眼」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Piáu-tsí ba̍k-thâu kuân, tshuē tuì-siōng kíng-tang-kíng-sai, kíng-uánn-kíng-tī, siánn-lâng tsai-iánn king-kuè kuí-nā nî suah “kíng--ah kíng, kíng-tio̍h tsi̍t ê bē lîng-gíng”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 表姊眼光高，找對象挑三揀四、東挑西揀，誰知道經過好幾年卻「挑來選去，最後選了個不怎樣的人」。
successful_records.source_word: 揀啊揀，揀著一个賣龍眼。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 竹筍仔炒肉絲蓋好食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tik-sún-á tshá bah-si kài hó-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 竹筍炒肉絲很好吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 瓜仔哖有腥味。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kue-á-nî ū tshènn-bī.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 小黃瓜有生青味。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阮逐擺對遐行過，攏會予樹枝刮著。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guán ta̍k-pái tuì hia kiânn--kuè, lóng ē hōo tshiū-ki kueh--tio̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我們每一次經過那裡，都會被樹枝絆到。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 一攕玉蘭花。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsi̍t tshiám gio̍k-lân-hue.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 一串玉蘭花。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 蔥頭味真薟，予人切甲流目屎。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tshang-thâu bī tsin hiam, hōo lâng tshiat kah lâu ba̍k-sái.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 洋蔥味真嗆，讓人切得流眼淚。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 香菇欲煮進前愛先浸水。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Hiunn-koo beh tsú tsìn-tsîng ài sing tsìm tsuí.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 香菇要煮之前要先泡水。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 種蒜頭的作穡人攏揀較媠的提去賣，留一寡脯去的家己食，莫怪人講：「燒瓷的食缺，織蓆的睏椅。」
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsìng suàn-thâu ê tsoh-sit-lâng lóng kíng khah suí--ê the̍h-khì bē, lâu tsi̍t-kuá póo--khì--ê ka-kī tsia̍h, bo̍k-kuài lâng kóng, “Sio-huî--ê tsia̍h khih, tsit-tshio̍h--ê khùn í.”。」
successful_records.chinese_translation: 蒜農都挑比較漂亮的拿去賣，留一些乾癟的自己吃，難怪人家說「燒瓷的自己用有缺口的碗，織草蓆的在椅子上睡覺。」
successful_records.source_word: 燒瓷的食缺，織蓆的睏椅。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這新品種的蓮霧一斤著兩百，你若交關兩斤，共你三割引就好。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tse sin phín-tsíng ê lián-bū tsi̍t kin tio̍h nn̄g-pah, lí nā kau-kuan--nn̄g-kin, kā lí sann kuah-ín tō hó.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這新品種的蓮霧一斤得兩百，你如果能買個兩斤，按售價減除三成賣你就好。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 紅豆做紅豆囥，綠豆做綠豆囥。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Âng-tāu tsò âng-tāu khǹg, li̍k-tāu tsò li̍k-tāu khǹg.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 紅豆放紅豆那裏，綠豆放綠豆那裏。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊覕佇烏暗的樹林，心內真驚惶。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I bih tī oo-àm ê tshiū-nâ, sim-lāi tsin kiann-hiânn.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他躲在黑暗的森林，內心很驚慌。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 樹仔跤的樹葉仔無偌濟，用鋏仔鋏鋏咧就會用得矣。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tshiū-á-kha ê tshiū-hio̍h-á bô guā-tsē, iōng giap-á giap-giap--leh tō ē-īng--tit--ah.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 樹底下的樹葉沒有很多，拿夾子夾一夾就可以了。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 除了竹仔佮七里香以外，燈仔花嘛是上捷種來做籬笆的樹仔。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tû-liáu tik-á kah tshit-lí-hiong í-guā, ting-á-hue mā sī siōng tsia̍p tsìng-lâi tsò lî-pa ê tshiū-á.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 除了竹子和七里香以外，朱槿也是最常種植來當圍籬的樹木。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 古早糧食缺欠的時，煮糜是幾粒米、一寡番薯簽乾摻一大坩水，「一粒田螺煮九碗公湯」，欲罟一粒飯粒仔就親像海底摸針，真僫啦！
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kóo-tsá niû-si̍t khueh-khiàm ê sî, tsú muê sī kuí lia̍p bí, tsi̍t-kuá han-tsî-tshiam-kuann tsham tsi̍t tuā khann tsuí, “tsi̍t lia̍p tshân-lê tsú káu uánn-kong thng”, beh koo tsi̍t lia̍p pn̄g-lia̍p-á tō tshin-tshiūnn hái-té bong tsiam, tsin oh--lah!。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 從前糧食匱乏的時代，煮稀飯是幾粒米、一些番薯簽乾加一大鍋的水，「一粒田螺煮九海碗湯」，要撈到一粒米粒就像海底撈針，好難啊！
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 俗語講，「甘蔗無雙頭甜。」也欲清閒，也欲趁大錢，世間哪有遐爾好空的代誌？
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Sio̍k-gí kóng, “Kam-tsià bô siang-thâu tinn.” Iā beh tshing-îng, iā beh thàn tuā tsînn, sè-kan ná ū hiah-nī hó-khang ê tāi-tsì?。」又要清閒，又要賺大錢，世上哪有那麼好的事情？
successful_records.chinese_translation: 俗話說，「甘蔗沒有頭尾都是甜的。」又要清閒，又要賺大錢，世上哪有那麼好的事情？
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 糋好的芋仔糋欲食進前愛閣乍一下。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsìnn hó ê ōo-á-tsìnn beh tsia̍h tsìn-tsîng ài koh tsànn--tsi̍t-ē.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 炸好的芋頭要吃之前得先過油再稍微炸一下。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 樹仔跤的樹葉仔無偌濟，用鋏仔鋏鋏咧就會用得矣。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tshiū-á-kha ê tshiū-hio̍h-á bô guā-tsē, iōng giap-á giap-giap--leh tō ē-īng--tit--ah.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 樹底下的樹葉沒有很多，拿夾子夾一夾就可以了。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 煮貢丸湯的時陣，摻一搣仔芹菜珠，不止仔合味。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsú kòng-uân-thng ê sî-tsūn, tsham tsi̍t-me-á khîn-tshài-tsu, put-tsí-á ha̍h-bī.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 煮貢丸湯的時候，加一把芹菜珠，非常對味。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 蓮花頭窒咧，著愛清清咧。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Liân-hue-thâu that--leh, tio̍h-ài tshing-tshing--leh.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 蓮蓬頭塞住了，需要清理一下。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這粒楊桃有六捻。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsit lia̍p iûnn-tô ū la̍k liām.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這顆楊桃有六片。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 公園內的花蕊真清芳。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kong-hn̂g-lāi ê hue-luí tsin tshing-phang.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 公園裡的花朵很清香。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 茄仔開黃花──反種。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kiô-á khui n̂g hue──huán-tsíng.。歇後語，形容違反常態。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 茄子一般都開紫色的花，開黃花的就是變種。歇後語，形容違反常態。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 去買一罐菜心來配糜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Khì bé tsi̍t kuàn tshài-sim lâi phuè muê.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 去買一罐菜心來配稀飯。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 桑椹會使通血路，促進胃腸運動，改善祕結。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Sng-suî ē-sái thong hueh-lōo, tshiok-tsìn uī-tn̂g ūn-tōng, kái-siān pì-kiat.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 桑椹可以活血，促進胃腸蠕動，改善便秘。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 媽祖廟埕的榕仔跤不時有老大人坐佇遐話仙。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Má-tsóo-biō-tiânn ê tshîng-á-kha put-sî ū lāu-tuā-lâng tsē tī hia uē-sian.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 媽祖廟廣場的榕樹下經常有老人家坐在那裡談天說地。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這種木瓜品質真好，你提一寡仔木瓜子去湠種。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsit tsióng bo̍k-kue phín-tsit tsin hó, lí the̍h tsi̍t-kuá-á bo̍k-kue-tsí khì thuànn-tsíng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這種木瓜品質很好，你拿一些木瓜種子去繁殖。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 「王梨頭，西瓜尾」是咧講王梨是倚蒂頭的所在上蓋甜，西瓜顛倒是離蒂頭上遠的彼爿較甜，欲食的時先食較無甜的彼爿就會愈食愈甜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: “Ông-lâi thâu, si-kue bué” sī teh kóng ông-lâi sī uá tì-thâu ê sóo-tsāi siōng-kài tinn, si-kue tian-tò sī lī tì-thâu siōng hn̄g ê hit pîng khah tinn, beh tsia̍h ê sî sing tsia̍h khah bô tinn ê hit pîng tō ē jú tsia̍h jú tinn.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 「鳳梨頭，西瓜尾」是說鳳梨最甜的地方是靠近基根底部的那頭，西瓜反而是離蒂頭最遠端的那邊最甜，要吃的時候先吃比較不甜的那邊就會越吃越甜。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿明開店做生理有趁著一點仔錢，就想欲借錢開連鎖店，𪜶某緊共擋講，你毋通「食無三把蕹菜，就欲上西天」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-bîng khui-tiàm tsò-sing-lí ū thàn-tio̍h tsi̍t-tiám-á tsînn, tō siūnn-beh tsioh tsînn khui liân-só-tiàm, in bóo kín kā tòng kóng, lí m̄-thang “tsia̍h bô sann pé ìng-tshài, tō beh tsiūnn se-thian”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 阿明開店做生意是賺到了一點錢，就想要貸款開連鎖店，他太太趕忙阻止他說，你別「吃不到三把空心菜，就妄想可以上西天」。
successful_records.source_word: 食無三把蕹菜，就欲上西天。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 柚仔囥予伊消水，會較甜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Iū-á khǹg hōo i siau-tsuí, ē khah tinn.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 柚子放置到水分消散一些，會比較甜。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 冰櫥內底有一鼎綠豆湯，你去𣁳一碗來食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ping-tû lāi-té ū tsi̍t tiánn li̍k-tāu-thng, lí khì khat tsi̍t uánn lâi tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 冰箱裡有一鍋綠豆湯，你去盛一碗來吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿榮頭一改贌園種弓蕉隨搪著風颱，了甲叫毋敢。佳哉尾仔換去夜市做油湯，拄著時機好，才予伊趁甲油洗洗，有影是「人飼人，一支骨；天飼人，肥朒朒」，真正予人袂𠢕得。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-îng thâu tsi̍t kái pa̍k-hn̂g tsìng king-tsio suî tn̄g-tio̍h hong-thai, liáu kah kiò-m̄-kánn. Ka-tsài bué--á uānn-khì iā-tshī tsò iû-thng, tú-tio̍h sî-ki hó, tsiah hōo i thàn kah iû-sé-sé, ū-iánn sī “lâng tshī lâng, tsi̍t ki kut; thinn tshī lâng, puî-tsut-tsut”, tsin-tsiànn hōo lâng bē-gâu--tit.。幸虧後來換跑道去夜市擺麵攤，遇到景氣好，才讓讓他賺得油水多多，真正是「只靠人，瘦巴巴；天幫助，笑哈哈」，人真的不能自以為了得。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 阿榮第一次租田園種香蕉就碰上颱風，賠的叫苦連天。幸虧後來換跑道去夜市擺麵攤，遇到景氣好，才讓讓他賺得油水多多，真正是「只靠人，瘦巴巴；天幫助，笑哈哈」，人真的不能自以為了得。
successful_records.source_word: 人飼人，一支骨；天飼人，肥朒朒。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 最近足歹運，欲食菜頭湯，去買著蓬心的菜頭；欲去剃頭，剃頭店無開門，有影是「人若衰，種匏仔生菜瓜」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsuè-kīn tsiok pháinn-ūn, beh tsia̍h tshài-thâu-thng, khì bé-tio̍h pōng-sim ê tshài-thâu; beh khì thì-thâu, thì-thâu-tiàm bô khui-mn̂g, ū-iánn sī “lâng nā sue, tsìng pû-á senn tshài-kue”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 最近運氣很糟，想喝蘿蔔湯，竟買到空心的蘿蔔；想去理髮，理髮店沒開門，真的是「人一倒楣，種匏瓜也會長出絲瓜」。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 你這馬看著高麗菜的價數好，才欲攢落去種，敢會赴市？
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Lí tsit-má khuànn-tio̍h ko-lê-tshài ê kè-siàu hó, tsiah beh tshuân lo̍h-khì tsìng, kám ē-hù-tshī
successful_records.chinese_translation: 你現在看到高麗菜的價格好，才想要準備去栽種，哪趕得上時機呢？
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 七月七，龍眼烏，石榴必。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tshit-gue̍h tshit, lîng-gíng oo, sia̍h-liû pit.。意為七月是龍眼和石榴成熟的季節。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 七月七，龍眼黑，石榴裂。意為七月是龍眼和石榴成熟的季節。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 若欲治荔枝欉頂懸的臭腥龜仔，用雪文水共噴，不止仔有應效。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Nā beh tī nāi-tsi-tsâng tíng-kuân ê tshàu-tshènn-ku-á, iōng sap-bûn-tsuí kā phùn, put-tsí-á ū ìng-hāu.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 想對付荔枝樹上的椿象，用肥皂水直接噴它相當有效。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 想欲食金瓜湯，煞規菜市仔攏無人咧賣金瓜，「無魚，蝦嘛好」，今仔日先買冬瓜轉來去𤉙排骨湯。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Siūnn-beh tsia̍h kim-kue-thng, suah kui tshài-tshī-á lóng bô lâng teh bē kim-kue, “bô hî, hê mā hó”, kin-á-ji̍t sing bé tang-kue tńg lâi-khì kûn pâi-kut-thng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 想喝南瓜湯，整個菜市場卻沒有人賣南瓜，「退而求其次」，今天先買冬瓜回家煮排骨湯。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 想欲食金瓜湯，煞規菜市仔攏無人咧賣金瓜，「無魚，蝦嘛好」，今仔日先買冬瓜轉來去𤉙排骨湯。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Siūnn-beh tsia̍h kim-kue-thng, suah kui tshài-tshī-á lóng bô lâng teh bē kim-kue, “bô hî, hê mā hó”, kin-á-ji̍t sing bé tang-kue tńg lâi-khì kûn pâi-kut-thng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 想喝南瓜湯，整個菜市場卻沒有人賣南瓜，「退而求其次」，今天先買冬瓜回家煮排骨湯。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 廟口的榕樹跤不時都有一寡人佇遐泡茶、開講。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Biō-kháu ê tshîng-tshiū-kha put-sî to ū tsi̍t-kuá lâng tī hia phàu tê, khai-káng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 廟口的榕樹下經常都有一些人在那裡泡茶、聊天。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阮兜的果子園種椪柑佮菝仔。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guán tau ê kué-tsí-hn̂g tsìng phòng-kam kah pua̍t-á.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我們家的果園種柑橘與芭樂。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿媽共燃好的青草仔茶，用漏仔貯入去玻璃矸仔，冰佇冰箱予逐家啉。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-má kā hiânn-hó ê tshenn-tsháu-á-tê, iōng lāu-á té ji̍p-khì po-lê kan-á, ping tī ping-siunn hōo ta̍k-ke lim.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 奶奶把煮好的青草茶，用漏斗裝進玻璃瓶中，冰在冰箱給大家喝。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 有人抾雨傘樹拄落落來的葉仔來治肝病，毋過有病應該愛去予醫生看才著。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ū lâng khioh hōo-suànn-tshiū tú lak--lo̍h-lâi ê hio̍h-á lâi tī kuann-pēnn, m̄-koh ū pēnn ing-kai ài khì hōo i-sing khuànn tsiah tio̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 有人撿大葉欖仁剛掉落的葉子來治肝病，不過有病應該還是去看醫生才對。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 牛犅𨂿會損蕩柑仔欉、柳丁欉、檸檬欉佮木瓜欉等果子欉。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Gû-káng-uainnh ē sńg-tn̄g kam-á tsâng, liú-ting tsâng, lê-bóng tsâng kah bo̍k-kue tsâng tíng kué-tsí tsâng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 天牛會危害橘子、柳丁、檸檬和木瓜樹等果樹。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 白菜滷是阮大家的手路菜，阮兜逐家攏真愛食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Pe̍h-tshài-lóo sī guán ta-ke ê tshiú-lōo-tshài, guán tau ta̍k-ke lóng tsin ài tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 滷白菜是我婆婆的拿手菜，我家每個人都很愛吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 韭菜花炒透抽，真佮喙。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kú-tshài-hue tshá thàu-thiu, tsin kah-tshuì.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 韭菜花炒透抽，很合胃口。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典
